title: Native Instruments Traktor PRO 2 v2.7.1 Incl. Patch-R2R [ATOM]
description:
Description:
TRAKTOR PRO 2 is the world-renowned, rock-solid 4-deck DJ software that gets you mixing straight out the box. Now with TRAKTOR 2 Technology Inside for enhanced ease-of-use, performance and creativity, this version boasts a new interface with TruWave colored waveforms for a visually rich experience of your music. Simpler than ever to use, TRAKTOR PRO 2 also sees the arrival of the new Sample Decks and Loop Recorder features for ultimate mix creativity.

Main Features:

New Creative Weapons:
TRAKTOR's intelligent features now allow for even easier remixing of tracks on the fly. Switch any deck to a Sample Deck and load up to four loops or one-shot samples each Ã¢â‚¬Å“16 in total. The new Loop Recorder can record loops from mixer channels, master out or audio interface inputs, while four much-requested new effects, including Tape Delay and Bouncer, round out the arsenal to more than 30 performance effects.

Get In The Mix:
Crate Flick cover art browsing and full iTunesÃâ€™Ã‚Â® and iPodÃâ€™Ã‚Â® integration makes finding the right track effortless. TRAKTORÃ¢â€žÂ¢''s acclaimed sync concept ensures that your tunes beatmatch perfectly so you can focus on the more exciting performance aspects of DJing.
TRAKTOR PRO's built-in mixer integrates multiple EQ and filter types, giving you full control of the frequency spectrum.

Total Flexibility:
Use any combination of MIDI controllers such as TRAKTOR KONTROL X1, or your keyboard and mouse to control the software. The new Auto Detection makes connecting and disconnecting your NI audio interface easy ÃÂ²Ãâ€šÃ¢â‚¬Å“ even while there are tracks playing in TRAKTOR. Assisted by the Setup Wizard with a drop-down menu, just select your interface and it assigns inputs and outputs for you. TRAKTOR PRO 2 is highly customizable with multiple, savable layouts and flexible hot key selection to suit your needs.


Key Features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Professional DJ software with 4 decks and intuitive layout
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Hi-res TruWave colored waveforms and easy-to-use interface with high contrast for club environments
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Automatic beat detection and beat-gridding of music files plus intuitive syncing for perfect mixes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Brand-new Sample Decks and innovative Loop Recorder to edit and remix tracks live, plus included loop content make it easy to get into the mix
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Over 30 studio-quality performance effects, including 4 new additions, all capable of syncing to track tempo
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Advanced looping and cueing functions plus 8 assignable hot cues per track
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Full-featured 4-channel software mixer with multiple EQ and filter options
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Powerful track management with Crate Flick cover art browsing and full iTunesÃâ€™Ã‚Â® integration
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Plug & play with all TRAKTOR controllers and audio interfaces, ships with mappings for all relevant DJ controllers
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Record your mix using the integrated audio recorder


What's New in version 2.7.1: 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢New Controller Editor Ã¢â‚¬â€œ version (1.7.2)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢S8 manuals are now included in the installers
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed issue that caused problems with the Ã¢â‚¬ËœLED off stateÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ on some TRAKTOR controllers
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed issue that caused a brightness problem on TRAKTOR KONTROL F1 controllers
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed issue where importing TSI settings from TRAKTOR PRO 2.6.8 caused high CPU load


System Requirements:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢OS: Windows 7 or 8 (latest Service Pack, 32/64 Bit) 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢RAM: 2 GB RAM (4 GB recommended)
